title: Inertial Agitation in an NMR Magnet: Real-Time Monitoring of Protein Aggregation at High Resolution.
abstract: We present a simple and efficient method to agitate NMR samples and thereby induce protein aggregation directly inside an NMR magnet. In this approach, termed
